phrases: I was raised as part of the Saigusa family.
It is an old, respected family.
It has a lot of pride in itself.
They started a tradition to ensure an heir.
Each woman in the family takes two husbands.
One of those husbands was that man.
Great way to keep a family going, right?
But I cannot laugh because we were born like that.
Futaki Kanata is a member of the family.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
After the two of us were born,
our three parents just could not take it anymore.
Shou went to the main house and became violent.
He was arrested for attempted murder.
With a criminal in the family, the Saigusa family's reputation was destroyed.
They kicked out our parents and took us in for themselves.
I was raised by the Saigusa family.
She was raised by the Futaki family, a branch of the Saigusas.
the Futaki family took control of the Saigusas.
And then, we learned of a shocking secret.
The two of us were born from separate fathers.
Sometimes, when a woman consummates with two men,
she can have children from both simultaneously.
So basically, one of us is the daughter of Saigusa Shou, a criminal.
Only our three parents know who is who.
But no one knows where the two who were kicked out went,
Shou refused to say anything in prison.
The Saigusa family held a family meeting
and decided to identify which of us was not the criminal's daughter so she could succeed the family.
We were raised and judged against each other.
For example, whoever learned to read first...
You know a lot of words, Kanata.
You can sit really straight, Kanata.
Whoever was smarter and more athletic...
Kanata won first place in the school marathon even with a fever!
She is at the top of her class too!
The one chosen to be heiress...
I was dubbed as the daughter of the criminal.
After that, they treated me like a harbinger of misfortune.
The daughter of a useless man.
Everyone wished I would never been born.
When the business was not doing well, it was my fault.
If there was bad gossip going around at a meeting, it was my fault.
I was beaten whenever anything happened.
Since she was such a model student, I decided to do things to piss her off.
I did the exact opposite of whatever she did.
It was fun to see her so annoyed.
The Saigusa family planted a spy in the school.
That is why they had weekly reports on what I did.
Our relatives would lecture her for hours.
She did that because you were not watching her closely enough!
She shames the family because you are not good enough!
I did not belong in my family.
I finally became free after coming to this school.
I was able to make friends, and I could finally have fun.
And now I am going to lose my place here too.
I did bad things on purpose.
They told me they wished I would never been born.
If I knew this was going to happen...
I wish I would never been born!
There was a time when I thought that way too.
I wished I would never been born.
I was about to give up on life.
But that is when Kyousuke told me...
Nothing good can come from rejecting yourself!
Nothing that is happened up until now matters!
Do not think so lightly of us now.
We are not like those worthless adults.
It is so much fun when you are around, Saigusa-san!
You are always so bright and cheerful!
Among us, you are the best...
You are all too nice, so you must be lying to me...
You are really thinking that you do not need me!
Get back in the game, Psychopathic Maracas!
Where did the jerk who ate my cutlet bowl go?
How can I fire myself up if you are not screwing around with a smile on?
Come on, let us fight again!
I wanted someone to stay by my side.
I wanted someone to say, Yeah, you are right.
We are by your side now.
You are one of the Little Busters.
We would be in a bind without you.
After that, we played baseball with Kyousuke managing practice.
You will not think that no one needs you again.
You should not be apologizing to us.
That is why I will do whatever it takes.
It seems you told those people about our family.
Do not drag your so-called friends into any trouble.
No matter what you say, Saigusa-san is an important member of the Little Busters.
Unlike someone, I am not weak.
I do not care if everyone hates me.
That is the type of person she is.
But I am okay now, Rin-chan.
And I am making a chiffon cake!
I am horrible at cooking, but I am good at cooking things with eggs!
If it has eggs in it, I am the best!
I am really happy I can do this.
I have never had friends before.
They did not really let me go to school often in the Saigusa house.
I am not used to being around other people.
I cannot really figure out the mood, and I mess up all the time.
You will get used to it soon enough.
I do not have much confidence in myself.
But since you will stay with me through thick and thin, I want to do what I can.
I am going to go see Saigusa Shou.
He is been in prison all my life,
I found out where he lives.
I will go see him and ask him...
We just decided without any evidence.
Even if I get the short end, I will still have closure.
If that is what you really want...
I am tired of not knowing.
If I find out who my real father is, I think that in itself will make me happy.
I would not have the courage to come alone.
We are almost at the address.
That is you, is not it?
You are just like the picture!
I am here to ask you...
Saigusa-san has suffered for a long time.
After all that suffering, all she wants to know is who her real father is.
And what if she finds out?
Knowing will not do her any good.
She went to see him in prison sometimes.
This situation is better for her!
I want to know the truth...
Is Saigusa-san really Saigusa Shou's daughter?
It is not my place to say this, but I think distributing those flyers was going too far
It is rare for the main family to come to a place like this.
I did not think you would respond.
Those people care more for outward appearances than anything else.
They are on pins and needles with our father out of prison.
What do you want me to say?
How nice you are to her.
You should not say things like that.
But she has more needs and indecision than anyone you have ever known.
If you are not really ready to deal with her, then
From what you are saying, I would say you are worried for her.
Do not you think life is a zero-sum game?
Do you think the amount of happiness is constant?
Let us say the amount of happiness and unhappiness in the world is fixed.
Life is a game where if one person becomes happy, another becomes unhappy.
Everyone thinks that they are the most unhappy.
And everyone who thinks they are unhappy thinks everyone else is happy.
unhappy in the Futaki family too?
Do you know who Saigusa-san's real father is?
If you do, please tell me.
That is why you would ask me something so heartless?
Do you think you can save her like that?
Who the hell do you think you are?
I just want to help someone.
If someone is suffering, I want to be of help to them.
I might be drunk with the desire to save Saigusa-san.
To think that anyone could save someone else is arrogant.
We may be fighting against something we cannot see.
Saigusa-san and Futaki-san are trapped in a manmade web of chains.
How can we free them from those chains?
Are thoughts of me troubling you?
Let us take a break from thinking!
It is softer and fluffier than last time!
I Wanted Someone to Stay by My Side
I Wanted Someone to Stay by My Side
I Wanted Someone to Stay by My Side
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
How can we untangle the chains around their hearts?
